fullText: Sara Bareilles has written a warm, intimate and highly personal musical score that feels like a departure from the typical Broadway sound, focusing on character and emotion over spectacle.
dtliExcerpt: Sara Bareilles has written a warm, intimate and highly personal musical score that feels like a departure from the typical Broadway sound, focusing on character and emotion over spectacle.
